ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs here.
ygData.msgSnippet: *Do you all *just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers? *Anyway...  I also really hate it when I use LOH on the MOB I m *trying to *kill....  It
ygData.messageBody:
*Do you all
*just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers?
*Anyway... I also really hate it when I use LOH on the MOB I'm
*trying to
*kill.... It never seems to appreciate it.
*

/smile Aye, I remember the early days of a Paladin's road.

And yes, unless I have a high level druid or wizard friend do a group
transport, I am running the land. But! The peril you encounter along the
way! The friends you make and the enemies you earn! Much more exciting.

And yes, after a long hiatus from my Paladin, I made the newbie (no offense)
mistake of hitting LOH when the monster was still targeted. My solution
(works for me, at least) is that I moved the hotbutton from the first bank
of buttons with my combat buttons to the second one, so that when I think to
change button banks I also think to change targets.

May Tunare bless and keep you (and Erollisi Marr, although now in Final we
high elves aren't permitted to worship her as Paladins... *grumble*)
